评论概述: Is way shorter than it looks
评论详情: I’m 5’5” with regular torso and leg proportions (as in my legs aren’t super long and my torso isn’t super short, my proportions are pretty balanced. In fact my legs are a tad short) and this dress was so short on me. Not just the length but the sweetheart neckline came up way above my chest. The wide seams that are on either side of the chest should be at about mid chest but they came fully above my chest. This dress just seems super petite like it was meant for someone 4’0”. I got the XXL and I’m 260lbs with a pear shaped body. It was fine width wise. I ended up just tailoring it into a blouse to wear with jeans because it was so short that it came right up under my behind.

Biggest disappointment. Will be returning.
